eu.tivian.musico.ui

Class LastFmFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • eu.tivian.musico.ui.LastFmFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, LifecycleOwner, ViewModelStoreOwner, SavedStateRegistryOwner

    public class LastFmFragment
extends Fragment
    Fragment displaying information about the Last.fm user.
